plan: Add semantic-release configuration and release workflow
Add release changelog and update governance changelog
Add E2E coverage for pricing page
Run required tests and capture evidence
actions: Created .releaserc.cjs with semantic-release plugins and npmPublish disabled
Added CHANGELOG.md for automated release notes
Updated task tracking and governance changelog
evidence: npm install failed due to registry 403, blocking dependency installs
npm run lint/type-check/test/test:e2e failed because dependencies could not be installed
decisions: Use npx with explicit --package flags in the release workflow so plugins resolve without local devDependencies
Keep npmPublish disabled because the project is marked private
risks: Release workflow depends on registry access during GitHub Actions runs
Local verification is limited until npm registry access is available
follow_ups: Run the release workflow in dry-run mode on a test branch in GitHub
Re-run lint, type-check, unit tests, and E2E tests after dependencies can install
reasoning_summary: Implemented release automation artifacts and added E2E coverage while documenting the current dependency-installation block that prevents local verification.
notes: No secrets. No private data. No raw chain-of-thought.
